   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to PRIDAR Chatbot's Telegram Deployment documentation!
==============================================================
The PRIDAR Chatbot's Telegram Deployment is a text based deployment 
of the VoiceFlow build to allow ease of accessibility to users. 

This program is tested in Python 3.9.0

.. automodule:: pridar_telegram_bot
    :members:

.. note::
   This project is part of UCL COMP0016 Team 10 PRIDAR Chatbot.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
